bike.description: FACT 10m carbon front triangle, women's FACT IS construction and geometry, tapered HT, OSBB, FACT carbon seatstays w/carbon drive DO and chainstays, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 100mm travel

components.description: Fox/Specialized remote Mini-Brain, inertia valve, w/ Brain Fade adjust, 185x43mm
Specialized Future Shock E100, inertia valve damper custom tuned for women, 1 1/2-1 1/8" carbon steer/crown, Brain Fade, external rebound adj., single sided air spring and damper, 100mm travel
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
36.9mm clamp, one bolt for carbon frame/post
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
